caption: A boy held a crossbow, menacingly pointing it at two women, coercing them into something they appeared to find abhorrent. Both women wore expressions of intense suffering and disgust.By a lakeside, an army was encamped, and inside a tent, two men engaged in conversation. One of the men seemed to be persuading the other, who appeared to hold a high status, as he remained silent and contemplative. There was a hint of intrigue in the air.During the evening, the latter man walked with a woman inside the tent. They conversed as they strolled, appearing quite content.In a desert-like setting, a woman encountered a black-skinned man on horseback, who conveyed something to her. The woman displayed great surprise at this encounter.
